channel.title: MS-chihuahua Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on MS-chihuahua Hugo Site

item.description:
About a month ago, I began learning programming.
At first, even just downloading Babel Fish and getting the “.qom” address was confusing, since it was my very first time using the terminal.
When I downloaded it for the first time, I didn’t even specify a save location in the terminal, so I ended up losing track of where it was saved.
Thanks to help from a member of QL1 JAPAN1, I learned the cd command for the first time.
I didn’t even know that I needed to specify where I was working.

item.title: My first post
item.description:
Hello everyone, I’m Ms. Chihuahua, also known as ayc3361, and also known as Chumu.

I’ve decided to take on the challenge of programming because I want to support QL1. To be honest, this is a completely new field for me, so I’ve been running into all sorts of mistakes along the way.

I’m documenting my journey in the hope that my experiences—even the struggles—might be helpful to others.
